about_the_game:
In the game's prologue you can expect, the first stage of the full version, a cross-section of mechanics, mini-games, first quests and an introduction to the game itself.
When war overtakes your people, it leaves a cruel imprint in the form of hard sacrifice and the crushing of the village. And here you are on the battlefield, confused and distraught, looking for any way to help your people win the battle. But what can you do if you're a simple craftsman?

Explore Battlefield and collect weapons:
- you're the only one on the battlefield and no danger looms on the horizon. There are plenty of remnants of weapons around — swords, shields, helmets… Take this great chance to your advantage! Observe surroundings, collect weapons, take away armors from the knights, sort and select the best of them. Once you have collected enough weapons, go to the workshop!


Restore items:
- grab the hammer! It’s time to work on these crooked arms. Heat it al lup a littl and choose the right tool to fix the sword. Your set of reliable tools is waiting for you. Using these tools also provides you with experience that you can use to improve your skills, making your work even more efficient enjoyable. Clean up the mess from the armor and don’t stop tinkering. Your effort can fix a lot.


Sell your work:
- all your efforts support your comrades but also help you to make some extra money. Help your village and protect your workshop by using powerful skills that you have. Dive into the world of enhancement and empower people to win the battle!


Solve puzzles in additional quest:
If you get bored with the main missions you can do other tasks based on interesting and addictive mini-games. Open castles, shoot crossbows and much more. Gather experience and expand your skills, which will allow you to immerse yourself even more deeply into the game world.


Find out what story is hidden in the history of this kingdom:
The world is full of mystery and intrigue. Look around carefully, as some residents may need your help. Talk to them to get valuable information or you will be given a special task to perform. Remember that people always pay lavishly for help


Discover more cities and battlefields:
The entire kingdom covers huge tracts of land. Some of these are dangerous war zones where scores of knights die every day. On the other hand, there are also huge merchant cities marveling at their amazing architecture. Embark on a journey and reach the remotest corners of the kingdom.

content_descriptors.notes:
In the game I will be two locations where you can find adult content, but I point out that this content will be very sensitive
1. medieval tavern - there you will be able to spot beer mugs or wine barrels
2. the Battlefield - but after the battle. This sourcing materials for the forge, such as swords, armor will be able to see some blood.
